name: T-Rex game NINTENDO DS
description:
Have you ever played T-Rex game on your computer when internet is down?

But have ever played T-Rex game on Nintendo DS? I think no. But now you can!

I wanted to try to create a game for Nintendo DS, so I challenged myself to recreate the famous T-Rex game from Google Chrome.

  • High score stored in flashcard.
  • Day night cycle
  • Official sprites and sounds
  • 60 FPS in game frame rate
  • Up and down arrows to play

Source code here : https://github.com/Fewnity/T-Rex-Runner-Game-Nintendo-DS

Have fun :)
